articles.description: Toby Roberts wins Great Britain's 14th gold in Paris and their first medal in sport climbing at an Olympics in the boulder and lead event.
articles.title: Olympic climbing: Toby Roberts wins climbing gold for Team GB

articles.description: Great Britain's women claimed Olympic 4x100m relay silver, just 0.07 seconds behind champions United States, in a thrilling race at the Stade de France.
articles.title: Olympic athletics: Great Britain's women take 4x100m relay silver, just 0.07secs behind United States

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: Find out the medal table from the Paris Olympics 2024, including overall medals, gold medals, silver medals and bronze medals for Team GB and other countries.
articles.title: Olympic Medal Table - Paris 2024 gold, silver & bronze tally

articles.description: Spain win first gold medal in men's football since 1992 by beating hosts France 5-3 after extra time in thrilling final at Parc des Princes.
articles.title: Olympics football: Spain beat France 5-3 in extra time to win gold

articles.description: Imane Khelif wins Olympics women's boxing gold a year after being disqualified from the World Championships for reportedly failing a gender eligibility test.
articles.title: Imane Khelif wins Olympic boxing gold by beating China's Yang Liu

articles.description: Great Britain's Katarina Johnson-Thompson says she is glad she "didn't give up" on on her career as she wins Olympic silver at Paris 2024.
articles.title: Katarina Johnson-Thompson: Paris 2024 Olympics heptathlon silver medallist glad she 'didn't give up'

articles.description: Toby Roberts wins a spectacular gold for Team GB as Katarina Johnson-Thompson takes silver in heptathlon.
articles.title: Paris Olympics: Top five stories from day 14 of 2024 Games - climber Roberts, relay medals, Johnson-Thompson

articles.description: The Netherlands overcome an almighty scare to retain their Olympic title in the women's hockey by beating China on penalties in the final.
articles.title: Paris 2024 hockey: Netherlands win gold against China on penalties

articles.description: Refugee athlete Manizha Talash displays the words "free Afghan women" on her outfit during her Olympic breaking battle in Paris.
articles.title: Olympics breaking: Refugee b-girl Talash wears slogan at Games
